metadata.Title: CVE-2022-48502 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 6.2. The ntfs3 subsystemdoes not properly check for correctness during disk reads, leading to anout-of-bounds read in ntfs_set_ea in fs/ntfs3/xattr.c.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').

linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
